Desc.eng: A real, honest monster hunter! I’m so glad that we met. I was just looking for a mercenary like you.
I’m not a mercenary and I don’t have time for idle chatter.

At least you could hear me out. I was exiled from my order and I had to leave our secret hideout. I won’t tolerate that kind of attitude, and frankly I need the place for myself. I thought that you might help me to get rid of my rivals. I’ll pay you 5000 Gold and some rare artifacts.
I’ve already warned you. I’m not a mercenary. Now leave me be.
Such a shame. I could have used someone with so much hatred towards my kind.
Sounds promising. Fine, I’ll deal with your rivals.
